LBL 0 x 10 = HLT GOTO 0

 1 06F0     0 00001101 111 B0
 2 0030     0 00000000 011 00
 3 0270     0 00000100 111 02  LBL 0  20
 4 2D30     0 01011010 011 A5  *      5A
 5 6870     0 11010000 111 B0  1      0B
 6 2830     0 01010000 011 A0  0      0A
 7 3D70     0 01111010 111 E5  =      5E
 8 2A70     0 01010100 111 A2  HLT    2A
 9 0630     0 00001100 011 30  GOTO 0 30
